O&P Foods is a specialist retail, wholesale and private label grocery importer.

Offering a range of the finest international and local food brands.

WHAT GUIDES AND DRIVES US

HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS

Award winning single varietal organic EVOO, traditional tomato and vegetable products and specialty fresh pasta retail lines.

O&P Foods is also a procurement and supply specialist to the wholesale, foodservice, QSR and food manufacturing sectors.

WORLD CLASS FOOD PRODUCERS

We partner only with those producers and manufacturers who share our high standards.

Passion with integrity are the core values of all our chosen food supply partners.

CUSTOMER FOCUSED

We aim to always exceed our customers’ expectations for quality food products and service.

Our international network ensures access to the most efficient supply chains with industry leading turnaround times.

OUR SERVICES...

We connect buyers with the world’s best food producers, facilitating new product development and offering global procurement, import & local delivery solutions.
